snippet: Night tennis at the United States Open received a chilly reception when it began in 1975, but now players consider matches under the lights an honor.
abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column notes that night tennis at the United States Open received a chilly reception when it began in 1975, but now players consider matches under the lights an honor.
lead_paragraph: Night tennis at the United States Open received a chilly reception when it began in 1975, but now players consider matches under the lights an honor.

headline.seo: George Vecsey — At the U.S. Open, the Big City’s Bright Lights
headline.main: A Heady Nightcap in a City Not Known for Sleeping
